item.title: Ykataza Yin Wang Shynakimiz
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: Moonecha, a nerd guy who always fail in love. He have problem in understanding woman’s feeling, that’s what make him always getting dumped by his girlfriend. But one day a mystery guy appear and give him a special glasses, the glasses that will change his life forever.
item.content:encoded: Moonecha, a nerd guy who always fail in love. He have problem in understanding woman’s feeling, that’s what make him always getting dumped by his girlfriend. But one day a mystery guy appear and give him a special glasses, the glasses that will change his life forever.

item.title: Lahasha Ya Shyng Bukitaza
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: A land where the strong makes the rules and weak has to obey. A land filled with alluring treasures and beauty yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xikajio Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly three years ago lost everything, his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother.
item.content:encoded: A land where the strong makes the rules and weak has to obey. A land filled with alluring treasures and beauty yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xikajio Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly three years ago lost everything, his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother.

item.title: Bita Sasumi Land

item.description:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states peroid.  Bita Sasumi  Land is the story of a...

item.content:encoded: Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states peroid.  Bita Sasumi  Land is the story of a young boy named Xinmi  who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.

item.description:
The  Gami Shiobita manga is a webtoon manhwa composed by Sung Sang-Young and illustrated by Sangahmichio.  Nevertheless, once the primary protagonist,  Haniji, realises that there’s before him saying that he’s eventually become a game character, a dialogue box, supernatural events begin occurring Haniji also referred to as “The  Gami Shiobita ” is the primary protagonist of the manhwa...

item.content:encoded:
The  Gami Shiobita manga is a webtoon manhwa composed by Sung Sang-Young and illustrated by Sangahmichio.  Nevertheless, once the primary protagonist,  Haniji, realises that there’s before him saying that he’s eventually become a game character, a dialogue box, supernatural events begin occurring
Haniji also referred to as “The  Gami Shiobita ” is the primary protagonist of the manhwa The Gami Shiobita that has lately find he has a Natural Ability known as Gami Shiobita. This skill makes his life is experienced by him in a game-like setting that has been derived from his gambling habit.

item.title: Jiokima
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: In a world where monsters called Yoma prey on humans and live among them in disguise, humanity’s only hope is a new breed of warrior known as Claymores. Half human, half monster, these silver-eyed slayers possess supernatural strength, but are condemned to fight their savage impulses or lose their humanity completely.
item.content:encoded: In a world where monsters called Yoma prey on humans and live among them in disguise, humanity’s only hope is a new breed of warrior known as Claymores. Half human, half monster, these silver-eyed slayers possess supernatural strength, but are condemned to fight their savage impulses or lose their humanity completely.

item.title: Hajimaru Himitsu no Jikan
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
From Heroines of Fantasia: 16-year-old Tsukimi Hina decides to get a part time job as a maid, and successfully passes her interview. One thing though: she can’t use modern technology inside the house whatsoever?! Which means no vacuums, no cellphones, no laptops, etc. What is up with her twisted, but handsome, employer Asakura Shiyuusei-san? And...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: From Heroines of Fantasia: 16-year-old Tsukimi Hina decides to get a part time job as a maid, and successfully passes her interview. One thing though: she can’t use modern technology inside the house whatsoever?! Which means no vacuums, no cellphones, no laptops, etc. What is up with her twisted, but handsome, employer Asakura Shiyuusei-san? And what exactly is he hiding in his storage room…? From Intercross: 16-year-old Hina’s first job is with a 19th-century British enthusiast, Shuusei-san, as his maid. Even the way of cleaning has to be from the 19th century! Even so, this sweet gentleman makes Hina’s heart beat so fast! There is actually another person in this residence, Mary Lou. She’s as cute as a doll, but… she’s, she’s… a ghost?!

item.title: Jikitami
item.dc:creator: link
item.description: Cross Academy is attended by two groups of students: the Day Class and the Night Class. At twilight, when the students of the Day Class return to their dorm, they cross paths with the Night Class on their way to school.
item.content:encoded: Cross Academy is attended by two groups of students: the Day Class and the Night Class. At twilight, when the students of the Day Class return to their dorm, they cross paths with the Night Class on their way to school.

item.title: Jikimisuji
item.dc:creator: link
item.description:
Makanatasa is a weapon meister, determined to turn her partner, a living scythe named Soul Eater, into a powerful death scythe  the ultimate weapon of Death himself! Charged with the task of collecting and devouring the tainted souls of ninety-nine humans and one witch, Maka and her fellow meisters strive to master their weapons as...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: Makanatasa is a weapon meister, determined to turn her partner, a living scythe named Soul Eater, into a powerful death scythe  the ultimate weapon of Death himself! Charged with the task of collecting and devouring the tainted souls of ninety-nine humans and one witch, Maka and her fellow meisters strive to master their weapons as they face off against the bizarre and dangerous minions of the underworld.
